name: Project Police
description:
Project Police is a top-down, realistic police-simulation game, where you as the player controls a police officer patrolling around the city.
Whether you just want to sit and eat donuts, or you actually wanna do something, is up yo you.
Your goal is... to... - well there is not really a goal, besides keeping 'dem criminals locked up!


In Project Police you have the option, to play alone, or to play on a server with other actual humans.
This makes it possible to keep it as close to the real world as possible.



The map is one big a** map, with a variety of buildings to look at, while nothing is happening.



The civilians in the city is "clever" and will do whatever they can to get out of that ticket.
So you gotta stay awake at all time, cuz' who knows - they might try to evade!
